name: Rite of Passage (diVISION+)
description:
LOST AND FOUND

You are lost, wandering through a deep miasma of woodlands when you happen upon a mysterious manor.  The servitor of the manor, a stranger to your eyes, welcomes you in with open arms and a wide-brimmed smile.

THE MASTER

You are deemed master of this manor.  Discover the truth behind yourself and your relationship with your servitor.

GAME FEATURES

This interactive fiction adventure features meaningful choices that impact your future.  Discover the secrets of the manor and uncover the truth behind yourself and those around you, including those who would remain hidden.

This game includes a gamut of non-player characters, optional dialogue choices, and interactable items.
